author: dreid
msg: This takes car of setting the variables for BONE to allow itto build
without a having to rerun configure for APR.  Hopefully this will go
away once BONE moves from beta.

author: stoddard
msg: gcc issues warnings when parsing AIX 4.3.3's pthread.h
which causes autoconf to incorrectly conclude that
pthreads is not available. Turn off warnings for this check
